globals.title: Discover Oregon Wine Country
globals.site_tagline: Access Exclusive Deals and Purchase Oregon Wines at OregonWineOffers.WineSpectator.com.
globals.description: We can tell you that Oregon wine country will exceed your expectations — and it will — but you’ve got to visit to truly understand why. The personal welcome you’ll receive in our tasting rooms is only surpassed by the beauty you’ll discover in your glass. Request your free 2018 Oregon Wine Touring Guide at oregonwine.org/welcome.
globals.keywords: Discover Oregon Wine Country, Oregon Wine Country, Wine Spectator’s Oregon Wines
globals.name: Discover Oregon Wine Country
